mean_cn: n. 天意，上帝，神的眷顾，深谋远虑
mean_en: God or fate thought of as the guide and protector of all human beings
word_etyma: pro向前+vid看+ence表名词→准备；深谋远虑
short_phrase: Her providence helps her save money.
sentence: Thanks to her providence, her piggy bank held plenty of money for a nice honeymoon.
sentence_trans: 多亏她深谋远虑，存钱罐里的钱足够度过一个愉快的蜜月了。
